DOC.brief_summary: To study effect acacia catechu herbal extract ; antipaque antigingivitis agent patient fix orthodontic appliances.This study double blind randomize control trial .
DOC.brief_title: `` The Efficacy Acacia Catechu Mouthrinse Antiplaque Antigingivitis Agent Fixed Orthodontic Appliance Patients .
